item.title: Animating time series data
item.description: Introduction Packages and data Summarizing posts by month Making animations Future directions Introduction A year ago, I started playing around with the gganimate package for my interactive clothing network post. I decided to revisit the package again as I wanted to create some animated visualizations for my upcoming PhD defense (Itâ€™s partially my hope that saying that out loud will make it feel more real). To my surprise, the gganimate package has undergone a transformation in the last year under the stewardship of Thomas Pederson.
